statements: SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT report_id, report_name, sales_amount FROM SalesReports ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM SalesReports WHERE market_segment = 'Retail' ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND market_segment = 'Online'
SELECT MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales FROM SalesReports
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM SalesReports ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM SalesReports WHERE market_segment = 'Enterprise';
SELECT report_name, sales_amount, customer_id FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_amount > 50000 AND market_segment = 'Small Business' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, customer_id, decision_making_notes FROM SalesReports WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM sales_performance_report ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, total_sales FROM sales_performance_report WHERE total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT report_id, products_sold FROM sales_performance_report WHERE products_sold = 10;
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior_report WHERE behavior_description LIKE '%loyal%';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_report ORDER BY behavior_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_performance_report ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_date, total_sales FROM sales_performance_report WHERE products_sold > 100 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_sales, products_sold FROM sales_performance_report WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND products_sold >= 50 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT behavior_id, customer_id, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior_report WHERE length(behavior_description) > 50;
SELECT behavior_id, customer_id, behavior_description, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior_report WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY behavior_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_performance_report;
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM sales_performance_report ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT report_name, sales_date FROM sales_performance_report WHERE sales_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM sales_performance_report WHERE sales_amount > 5000 ORDER BY sales_amount ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, sales_date FROM sales_performance_report WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchased_items FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchased_items > 5;
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM sales_performance_report WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM market_trends_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_id;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends_analysis WHERE trend_description LIKE '%innovation%';
SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM sales_reports WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_score FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT decision_name, decision_date FROM strategic_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_score FROM customer_behavior WHERE loyalty_score > 80;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT decision_name, decision_description FROM strategic_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM sales_reports WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports;
SELECT report_name, sales_amount, sales_region FROM SalesReports ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, date_created FROM SalesReports WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, last_interaction_date FROM CustomerBehavior ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports ORDER BY date_created DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_name, sales_amount FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_region = 'East' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trend_end_date ASC;
SELECT decision_title, decision_status FROM StrategicDecisions WHERE decision_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY decision_date DESC LIMIT 3;
